00004 /*!  \file  octeon-drv-opcodes.h
00005      \brief Common: Opcodes used by host and core PCI driver. 
00006 */
00007 
00008 #ifndef __OCTEON_DRV_OPCODES_H__
00009 #define __OCTEON_DRV_OPCODES_H__
00010 
00011 
00012 
00013 /* Opcodes used by host driver/apps to perform operations on the core */
00014 /* Opcodes in the ranges
00015    -  0x1000 to 0x1FFF
00016    -  0x7000 to 0x7FFF are reserved by the host driver */
00017 
00018 /* Note: The core driver uses the lower 16 bits as an index into a 
00019          table of function pointers that is MAX_DRV_OPCODES in length.
00020          See that the lower 16-bits are unique for each driver opcode
00021          and does not exceed MAX_DRV_OPCODES in value. */
00022 #define DRIVER_OP_START             0x1001
00023 
00024 /* Opcodes 0x1000-0x10FF reserved for base driver. */
00025 #define CORE_MEM_MAP_OP             0x1001
00026 #define HOT_RESET_OP                0x1002
00027 #define DEVICE_STOP_OP              0x1003
00028 #define DEVICE_START_OP             0x1004
00029 
00030 
00031 /* Values in param field for DEVICE_START/STOP_OP */
00032 #define  DEVICE_IPD                 0x1
00033 #define  DEVICE_PKO                 0x2
00034 
00035 
00036 /* Opcodes 0x1100-0x11FF reserved for the CNTQ module. */ 
00037 #define CNTQ_INIT_OP                0x1110
00038 #define CNTQ_CREDIT_OP              0x1112
00039 #define CNTQ_QUERY_OP               0x1113
00040 #define CNTQ_RESET_OP               0x1114
00041 #define CNTQ_DELETE_OP              0x1115
00042 
00043 #define DDOQ_INIT_OP                0x1116
00044 #define DDOQ_CREDIT_OP              0x1117
00045 #define DDOQ_QUERY_OP               0x1118
00046 #define DDOQ_RESET_OP               0x1119
00047 #define DDOQ_DELETE_OP              0x111A
00048 #define DDOQ_DMA_COMP_OP            0x111B
00049 
00050 #define PCIE_MAP_OP                 0x111C
00051 
00052 #define CVM_DRV_RESP_COMP_OP        0x111D
00053 
00054 /* Used by PCI TOE */
00055 #define PCI_TOE_GETLINK_OP          0x111E
00056 
00057 #define DRIVER_OP_END               0x111E
00058 
00059 /* Opcodes 0x1200-0x12FF reserved for the NIC module. */ 
00060 #define OCT_NW_PKT_OP               0x1220
00061 #define OCT_NW_CMD_OP               0x1221
00062 #define HOST_NW_INFO_OP             0x1222
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 #define MAX_DRV_OPCODES             64
00067 
00068 
00069 /* Opcodes 0x1300-0x13FF reserved for driver test applications. */
00070 
00071     /* These opcodes are used in test packets sent to the core application
00072        in base module. */
00073 #define CVMCS_REQRESP_OP            0x1301
00074 #define CVMCS_DMA_OP                0x1302
00075 #define CVMCS_REQRESP_COMP_OP       0x1303
00076 
00077 
00078     /* These opcodes are used in the octeon_pcitest application */ 
00079 #define HOST_TO_CORE_PKT            0x1305
00080 
00081     /* For CN56XX Peer to Peer test packet */
00082 #define EP_TO_EP_OP                 0x1306
00083 
00084 
00085        /* These opcodes are used by the validation test application. */
00086 #define OPV_OPCODE_BEGIN            0x1310
00087 
00088 #define OPV_INIT_OP                 0x1311
00089 #define OPV_START_OP                0x1312
00090 #define OPV_STOP_OP                 0x1313
00091 #define OPV_REPORT_OP               0x1314
00092 #define OPV_TEST_OP                 0x1315
00093 #define OPV_CORE_INFO_OP            0x1316
00094 #define OPV_DMA_PKT_OP              0x1317
00095 #define OPV_DMA_INTR_OP             0x131F
00096 
00097 #define OPV_OPCODE_END              0x131F
00098 
00099 
00100 
00101 
00102 /* Opcodes used by core driver/apps to perform operations on the host */
00103 /* Opcodes in the ranges
00104    - 0x8000 to 0x8FFF
00105    - 0xF001 to 0xFFFF are reserved by the core driver */
00106 
00107 /* These two opcodes are used by the base application to send test packets
00108  * on Output queues. */
00109 #define DROQ_PKT_OP1                0x8001
00110 #define DROQ_PKT_OP2                0x8002
00111 
00112 /* These two opcodes are used by NIC core application. */
00113 #define CORE_NW_DATA_OP             0x8003
00114 #define CORE_NW_INFO_OP             0x8004
00115 
00116 /* This opcode is sent by core PCI driver to indicate cores are ready. */
00117 #define CORE_DRV_ACTIVE_OP          0x8005
00118 
00119 /* This opcode is used in octeon pcitest application */
00120 #define CORE_TO_HOST_PKT            0x8006
00121 
00122 /* Used by PCI TOE */
00123 #define PCI_TOE_LINKSTATUS_OP       0x8007
00124 
00125 
00126 #define DDOQ_PKT_OP                 0x8101
00127 #define DDOQ_EOT_OP                 0x8102
00128 #define DDOQ_COPY_PKT_OP            0x8103
00129 
00130 #define PCI_INSTR_RESP_OP           0x8F01
00131 
00132 #define CORE_MEM_MAP_ACK_OP         0xFF01
00133 
00134 #define CNTQ_INIT_DONE_OP           0xFFF2
00135 #define CNTQ_PKT_OP                 0xFFF3
00136 #define PCITEST_SETUP_OP            0xFFF4
00137 
00138 #define CORE_DRV_TEST_SCATTER_OP    0xFFF5
00139 
00140 
00141 /* Application codes advertised by the core driver initialization packet. */
00142 #define CVM_DRV_APP_START           0x0
00143 #define CVM_DRV_NO_APP              0
00144 #define CVM_DRV_APP_COUNT           0x5
00145 #define CVM_DRV_BASE_APP            (CVM_DRV_APP_START + 0x0)
00146 #define CVM_DRV_NIC_APP             (CVM_DRV_APP_START + 0x1)
00147 #define CVM_DRV_CNTQ_APP            (CVM_DRV_APP_START + 0x2)
00148 #define CVM_DRV_NIC_CNTQ_APP        (CVM_DRV_APP_START + 0x3)
00149 #define CVM_DRV_INVALID_APP         (CVM_DRV_APP_START + 0x4)
00150 #define CVM_DRV_APP_END             (CVM_DRV_INVALID_APP - 1)
00151 
00152 
00153 #endif
